alert.note: Alert for City of Danville; Pittsylvania (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 4:16AM EST until January 11 at 11:12AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of north central North Carolina, including the following county, Caswell and Virginia, including the following counties and independent city, Campbell, Charlotte, City of Danville, Halifax and Pittsylvania. * WHEN...Until 700 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 415 AM EST, gauge reports indicated that several creeks and stream were above flood stage. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain had fallen earlier. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Danville, Altavista, Yanceyville, Bethel, Hurt, Chatham and Gretna. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
